mdRecord.dcterms:title: Reports of cases argued and determined in the Supreme Court of Appeals of Virginia: with select cases relating chiefly to points of practice, decided by the Superior Court of Chancery for the Richmond District .. [1806-1810] / By William W. Hening and William Munford
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Hening, William Waller, 1768-1828
Munford, William, 1775-1825
Virginia. Superior court of chancery (Richmond district)
Virginia. Supreme Court of Appeals.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Vol. 2 has imprint: Flatbush, (N.Y.) Printed and published by I. Riley. 1809; v. 3-4, New-York, Printed and published by Isaac Riley. 1810-11.
Court of Appeal cases from October 1806 to October 1809; Court of Chancery cases from September 1806 to February 1810.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Law reports, digests, etc--Virginia.
